EmailTemplate.description: Notification is generated when system automatically changes the BX009 status to Project Kick Off
EmailTemplate.name: GMPL/ BX009: BX009 that has been Kicked Off
EmailTemplate.subject: BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has been Kicked Off
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi, The BX009 named '{!GMPL_BX009__c.Project__c}' has been Kicked Off. Please complete CE specific details on the BX009 and select the checkbox 'Completed by CE Admin' for system to take further action. The BX009 can be accessed via {!GMPL_BX009__c.Link}.
Thanks.
